    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          <title>
            <string language="fr">Formation d'un arc-en-ciel</string>
            <string language="en">Rainbow formation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Regenbogenanordnung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Formação do arco-íris</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Formazione del Rainbow</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σχηματισμός ουράνιων τόξων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Formación del arco iris</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Cette illustration montre la formation des arcs-en-ciel par la scission de la lumière blanche du soleil en une séquence de couleurs.</string>
            <string language="en">This illustration demonstrates the formation of rainbows by splitting up white sunlight into a sequence of colours.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">couleurs</string>
            <string language="en">colours</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">arc-en-ciel</string>
            <string language="en">rainbow</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">réflexion</string>
            <string language="en">reflection</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">réfraction</string>
            <string language="en">refraction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">spectre</string>
            <string language="en">spectrum</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">lumière blanche</string>
            <string language="en">white light</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die Anordnung der 
Regenbogen, indem sie herauf weißes Tageslicht in eine Reihenfolge 
von Farben aufspaltet.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração demonstra a formação dos 
arco-íris rachando acima da luz solar branca em uma seqüência das 
cores.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione dimostra la formazione dei 
Rainbow da luce solare bianca scindere in una sequenza dei colori.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση καταδεικνύει το σχηματισμό των 
ουράνιων τόξων από το άσπρο φως του ήλιου διάσπασης σε μια 
ακολουθία χρωμάτων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración demuestra la formación de arco 
iris por la luz del sol blanca de la división en una secuencia de 
colores.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Farben</string>
          </keyword>

            <string language="x-mt-de">Regenbogen</string>
